exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a flat bench, grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width. Keep your feet flat on the ground and maintain a slight arch in your lower back. Lower the bar to your mid-chest, then press up while keeping your wrists straight and elbows tucked at roughly 45 degrees.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Hang from a pull-up bar with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width, palms facing away. Pull yourself up until your chin clears the bar, focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades together. Lower yourself with control to full arm extension.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly pointed outward. Keep your chest up and core tight, bend at your knees and hips simultaneously. Lower until thighs are parallel to the ground, keeping your knees in line with your toes. Push through your heels to return to starting position.

exercises.name: Military Press
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, grip the barbell at shoulder level with hands slightly wider than shoulders. Keep your core tight and press the bar overhead until arms are fully extended. Lower the bar back to shoulder level with control.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell over mid-foot. Hinge at your hips to grip the bar just outside your legs. Keep your chest up and back straight, drive through your heels and stand up straight, keeping the bar close to your legs throughout the movement.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Stand with dumbbells at your sides, palms facing forward. Keep your upper arms stationary and curl the weights toward your shoulders. Pause briefly at the top, then lower with control. Avoid swinging or using momentum.

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdowns
exercises.description: Stand facing a cable machine with high attachment, grip the bar with palms facing down. Keep your upper arms locked at your sides, extend your arms downward until fully straight. Slowly return to starting position while maintaining control.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.description: Hold a barbell at hip level with an overhand grip. Keep your legs slightly bent, hinge at your hips while keeping your back straight. Lower the bar along your legs until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, then drive your hips forward to return to starting position.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Start in a forearm plank position, elbows directly under shoulders. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels, engage your core, and don't let your hips sag. Hold this position while breathing steadily.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.description: Sit at a lat pulldown machine, grip the bar wider than shoulder-width. Keep your chest up and pull the bar down to your upper chest, focusing on using your back muscles. Control the weight as you return to starting position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
exercises.description: Place one knee and hand on a bench, other foot on the ground. Hold a dumbbell with your free hand, pull it up to your hip while keeping your elbow close to your body. Lower with control, feeling the stretch in your lat.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Sit in the leg press machine with your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform. Lower the weight by bending your knees until they're at about 90 degrees. Push through your heels to return to starting position, avoiding locking your knees at the top.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Sit with back support, hold dumbbells at shoulder level with palms facing forward. Press the weights overhead until arms are extended but not locked. Lower the weights back to shoulder level with control.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Sit with knees bent and feet off the ground, lean back slightly. Hold a weight with both hands, rotate your torso from side to side, touching the weight to the ground on each side. Keep your core engaged throughout.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lunges
exercises.description: Stand holding dumbbells at your sides. Step forward with one leg and lower your body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees. Push off your front foot to return to starting position. Alternate legs with each rep.
